edep.notes: Each detector is simulated separately, files are marked with the channel number. The number of simulated events in each volume is calculated such to have a uniform distribution in the Ge76 mass over the complete array. Macros are auto-generated with the `UTILS/create-macros/create-2nbb-macros.jl` script from the `log/raw-gedet-intrinsic_chanwise-2nbb-%DET.tmac` template macro
